Module GNIOT_CRS_POS_PROJECT
Package com.gniot.crs.dao

Class StudentDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.gniot.crs.dao.StudentDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
StudentDAOInterface
public class StudentDAOImpl extends Object implements StudentDAOInterface
Implementation of StudentDAOInterface. This class provides the SQL implementation for student operations such as browsing courses, changing passwords, retrieving account info, and managing course enrollments.
